text: Luca Braidot (born 29 May 1991) is an Italian professional mountain bike and cyclo-cross cyclist. He rode at the cross-country event at the 2016 Summer Olympics, where he finished 7th. At the 2018 European Mountain Bike Championships, he finished 2nd in the cross-country event. ==Major results== ===Mountain Bike=== ;2012 : 1st 20px Team relay, World Championships : 1st 20px Mixed relay, European Championships : 3rd 20px Cross-country, European Under-23 Championships ;2014 : 1st 20px National Championships ;2018 : European Championships ::1st 20px Mixed relay ::2nd 20px Cross-country ;2019 : 2nd 20px Mixed relay, European Championships ===Cyclo-cross=== ;2010–2011 : 2nd National Under-23 Championships ;2011–2012 : 3rd National Under-23 Championships ;2012–2013 : 2nd National Under-23 Championships ;2014–2015 : 3rd National Championships ;2016–2017 : 3rd National Championships ;2017–2018 : 1st 20px National Championships ;2018–2019 : 2nd National Championships ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Italy Category:Italian mountain bikers
title: Luca Braidot
